faqs.question: What is Okal Wallet?
faqs.answer: Okal Wallet is a secure digital wallet that lets you make quick and cashless payments for your grocery orders within the Okal app.

faqs.question: How can I add money to my Okal Wallet?
faqs.answer: You can add money to your Okal Wallet using UPI, debit card, credit card, or net banking directly from the Wallet section in the app.

faqs.question: Is there any minimum or maximum limit for adding money to the wallet?
faqs.answer: The minimum add amount is ₹10 and the maximum limit is ₹10,000 per month, depending on your KYC status.

faqs.question: Can I withdraw money from my Okal Wallet to my bank account?
faqs.answer: No, currently you cannot withdraw wallet money to your bank account. The balance can only be used for placing Okal orders.

faqs.question: Can I transfer Okal Wallet balance to another user?
faqs.answer: No, wallet balance is non-transferable and can only be used by the account holder for Okal orders.

faqs.question: What happens if my order is cancelled or refunded?
faqs.answer: In case of cancellation or refund, the refund amount will be credited back to your Okal Wallet or your original payment source, depending on the payment method.

faqs.question: Does Okal Wallet money expire?
faqs.answer: No, your Okal Wallet balance does not expire. However, promotional or cashback credits may have an expiry date mentioned in the offer details.

faqs.question: Can I use my Okal Wallet along with other payment methods?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use your Okal Wallet balance along with other payment options like UPI or cards for a single order.

faqs.question: Is my wallet balance safe on Okal?
faqs.answer: Yes, all wallet transactions are encrypted and fully secured as per RBI guidelines.

faqs.question: Why can’t I see my wallet option during checkout?
faqs.answer: Wallet option might be temporarily unavailable if your account is under verification or if wallet services are under maintenance.

faqs.question: What if my wallet recharge fails but the amount is deducted?
faqs.answer: In case of a failed transaction, the deducted amount is automatically refunded to your original payment source within 3–5 working days.

faqs.question: Can I check my wallet transaction history?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can view your wallet transactions under the 'My Wallet' section in the Okal app.

faqs.question: Can I use wallet balance to pay for delivery charges?
faqs.answer: Yes, your wallet balance can be used for delivery charges and any other payable amount during checkout.

faqs.question: Are there any cashback offers for using Okal Wallet?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal frequently runs cashback offers for wallet payments. You can check active wallet offers in the 'Offers & Coupons' section.

faqs.question: Can I use wallet balance for subscription or membership payments?
faqs.answer: Yes, wallet balance can be used to pay for Okal Plus or Okal Super Saver memberships, unless otherwise specified.

faqs.question: What is the KYC process for Okal Wallet?
faqs.answer: You may be required to complete a simple KYC verification using your PAN or Aadhaar details to increase wallet limits and enable full functionality.

faqs.question: Will my Okal Wallet balance be refunded if I delete my account?
faqs.answer: Please withdraw or use your balance before deleting your account, as wallet funds are non-transferable and non-refundable after account deletion.

faqs.question: Can I earn referral rewards in my Okal Wallet?
faqs.answer: Yes, referral and promotional rewards may be credited to your Okal Wallet after successful order completion by your referred friends.

faqs.question: Why is my wallet showing a negative balance?
faqs.answer: A negative balance can occur if a previous cashback or promotional amount is revoked. Contact support if you believe it’s an error.

faqs.question: How long does it take for a refund to reflect in my Okal Wallet?
faqs.answer: Refunds are usually processed within minutes but may take up to 24 hours depending on the transaction type.
